id.description: A unique identifier for the software.

type.description: The type of object, always 'malware' for a MITRE ATT&CK software object.

created.description: The date and time the software was created.

modified.description: The date and time the software was last modified.

description.description: A brief description of the software and what it does.

source_name.description: The name of the external source.

url.description: The URL of the external source.

external_references.description: A list of external references (e.g., URLs or other reference material) that provide more information about the software.

x_mitre_version.description: The version of MITRE ATT&CK that the software was added or updated in.

x_mitre_deprecated.description: Indicates whether the software has been deprecated and is no longer considered a valid entity.

x_mitre_aliases.description: A list of alternative names or titles for the software.

x_mitre_platforms.description: A list of platforms that the software is compatible with.

x_mitre_permissions_required.description: A list of permissions required by the software.

x_mitre_detection.description: Information on how to detect the use of the software.

x_mitre_data_sources.description: A list of data sources that can be used to detect the use of the software.
